about_the_game:
In a ravaged post-apocalyptic world, you are a resourceful merchant operating from the safety of your isolated bunker. Cut off from the dangers of the outside, you rely on scavenger teams to venture into the desolate wastelands in search of vital supplies. Every trade you make and every deal you broker shapes the fragile balance of power among the struggling factions, determining who thrives and who falls. As the unseen force behind a growing network of survivors, your business decisions will not only dictate the fate of your shelter but also influence the course of the world beyond your bunker’s walls.

Sell

you take on the role of a shrewd merchant whose primary goal is to sell as much as possible, even at the expense of those you deal with.

Buy

Deploy scavenger teams to strategic locations in search of valuable items; they won't always return alive or with what you need, but that's acceptable as long as you're safe.

 

Grow your bunker

Expand your bunker to accommodate larger and more valuable items, and enhance its security. Remember, those who trade with you today may covet what you have tomorrow.

Factions

Maintain a delicate balance between warring factions; while they often use your weapons against each other, if one were to emerge victorious, they might no longer need your services.

Survive

Your bunker is made of concrete, but you are not. Survive the radiation from external items and withstand the stress caused by isolation using all the resources at your disposal.

content_descriptors.notes: The product contains scenes of people being burned, scenes with alcohol and tobacco, and a possible suicide scene.

name: Nuclear Apocalypse Merchant Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: i5 3550 / RYZEN 5 2500X
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 / AMD R9 270X
  • Storage: 11 GB available space

short_description: A post-apocalyptic single-player simulator where you sell resources to survivors to withstand internal and external threats. Work with scavengers to gather supplies, keep your shelter secure, and uncover the secrets of the bunker.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Ukrainian, Korean, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil
